EmailTemplate.subject: Timetables and Contracts for NCS with The Challenge autumn programme
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your local staffing team.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Welcome back and we hope you are looking forward to working with us at NCS with The Challenge again!
Your contracts and timetables are now available on the Staffing Website, under the 'My Role' section.
Click here to access your contract and timetable
Please follow these steps:-
Read the terms and conditions of the contract carefully and submit a response.You must submit a response to each contract. Download a copy for your reference. Once you have completed your employment with us you will not be able to access your contracts and timetables on line. Login the day before you begin your role as we communicate timetable changes via the Staffing Website. If you do not check at this time you could go to the wrong location.
We hope you are excited about your role and we will be in touch soon!
If you have any questions please contact your local staffing representative quoting the email reference number in any correspondence.
Best wishes,
NCS with The Challenge CCR 18
